item.title: CVE-2024-43318|2024-08-19T13:39:47.232Z -- e2pdf.com -- e2pdf
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in E2Pdf.Com allows Stored XSS.This issue affects e2pdf: from n/a through 1.25.05.
